name: Garage Masters
description:
Garage Masters is a local two player co-op where you must battle your way through you day at the shop. Play with your friend and work as a team to complete all the orders before you run out of money. Complete orders before cars pile up in your garage while trying not to get run over!

GOOD LUCK!

┏━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓

Controls

Player1

Movement - WASD

Interact - E

Player2

Movement - Arrow Keys

Interact - F

┗━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┛

┏━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓
